# contents

**Instance Property**

An object providing the image contents of the component.

## Declaration

```swift
var contents: Any? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Typically you set an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImage] instance or a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGImage] as content.

## Dragging Image Contents

- **frame**: The coordinate space is the bounds of the parent dragging item.

items.description: The coordinate space is the bounds of the parent dragging item.
